Trinity:

"NOOOOOOOO" cried Trinity while she saw Aerotaur hurted and she ran 
towards Deemos
"No... Wait!!!" screamed Nightlight and she ran,  trying to stope her.

--- In nbwrpg@y..., Rudra656@a... wrote:
> OOC: Umm ... about activating all of the codes.  Obfucious didn't 
touch your 
> program.  All he did was look at the code so he didn't have to 
start from 
> scratch.
> 
> ::Aerotaur::
>     Aerotaur flinches as Grounded's blasts fly past his head.  He 
wonders 
> silently why Grounded shot at Deemos when he was so close.  He 
spots the 
> knives flying at Trinity and he deftly sprints in front of them.  
He manages 
> to deflect on with his wing but the other imbeds itself in his 
shoulder.  
> "YOU WILL DIE!!!!!"  His left arm hangs limp from the knife in his 
shoulder.  
> He reaches up and yanks it out of his skin.  Mech fluid sprays onto 
the 
> ground.  Using only his right arm he flings the knife back at 
Deemos.  "He is 
> mine Grounded.  This is an old battle.  Keep Trinity safe."  With 
that said 
> he launches himself at Deemos.  He begins slashing at his head with 
his 
> energy-bladed staff.
